QuestData.Title: The Speaker of Elune
QuestData.Description:
Fortune smiles upon us, $n. We have found a soul in Ardenweald who was once a Night Warrior in life, as Tyrande is now.
His name is Thiernax. I am told he assists in tending to the spirits resting in the Garden of Night.
Seek him out and petition him for aid. I pray he will have wisdom to share.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Thiernax near the Queen's Garden.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Qadarin in the Garden of Night.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Qadarin watches Thiernax race off. He sighs before turning to you.>
My apologies. Thiernax may have seemed curt, but there is a reason for his reluctance to speak of the Night Warrior.
If you have a moment to help me out in the garden, I can elaborate. Then I will see what can be done to convince Thiernax to help your mother.
